pages.text: You may have never played with $(#ffa500)$(l)FTB Quests$(reset) in the past, so this chapter aims at giving you a short introduction to the world of quests. What quests are should speak for itself, $(l)a series of tasks you can complete that reward you with something when you finish them$(reset).

They are completely optional, but can often be very useful for small tips, guidance for mods you’re not familiar with or simply a fun thing to do. The tasks can be very different from one another, ranging from just crafting a certain item, to submitting power or completing a specific task. In general, a specific quest will tell you what it wants you to do and what it will give you in return. Some quests will reward you with items, while others might even give you randomized loot!

If you’re not too sure what to do or aren’t familiar with a specific mod, try following the chapter associated with it. Even if you do know the mod already, you might discover something you didn’t know and get a lot of goodies back while doing so! What are you waiting for? $(l)Access quests by opening up a Quest Book, from your inventory with the Quest Book icon in the top left, or with the keybind associated with it ($(k:ftbquests.quests)).$(reset) Happy questing!
